title: The sub-station proposed to be constructed in open space shall be in such a manner that it is away from the main building at a distance of at least 3 m and in general does not affect the required side margin open spaces or prescribed width or internal access or larger open space
clause_text: The sub-station proposed to be constructed in open space shall be in such a manner that it is away from the main building at a distance of at least 3 m and in general does not affect the required side margin open spaces or prescribed width or internal access or larger open space. The substation can be provided in stilt/podium/within building line subject to compliance of fire safety requirements, or as may be decided by the Commissioner.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The sub-station proposed to be constructed in open space shall be in such a manner that it is away from the main building at a distance of at least 3 m and in general does not affect the required side
